## VersioningPolicy.classify() method

> This API is provided as an alpha preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.
> 

Classifies a change to determine its release type.

**Signature:**

```typescript
classify(change: AnalyzedChange, context?: ClassifyContext): ReleaseType;
```

</td></tr>

**Returns:**

[ReleaseType](./change-detector-core.releasetype.md)

The release type (major, minor, patch, or none)
